body_html:
I am experimenting with changing input sizes in Amos's DenseNet implementation. Let me run some experiments and report back. I also looked at the models on TorchVision repo, and resnet doesn't seem to have a fixed 224x224 size.

https://github.com/pytorch/vision/blob/master/torchvision/models/resnet.py

Memory / RAM allocation failure are totally normal, however library should fail more gracefully rather than the user hitting ^C.
body_text:

https://github.com/pytorch/vision/blob/master/torchvision/models/resnet.py
Memory / RAM allocation failure are totally normal, however library should fail more gracefully rather than the user hitting ^C.
body:
I am  experimenting with changing input sizes in Amos's DenseNet implementation.  Let me run some experiments and report back.  I also looked at the models on TorchVision repo, and resnet doesn't seem to have a fixed 224x224 size.

https://github.com/pytorch/vision/blob/master/torchvision/models/resnet.py

Memory / RAM allocation failure are totally normal, however library should fail more gracefully rather than the user hitting ^C.
